summary: Completed testing of UnTrash Berlin v6 new features. All 8 requested features verified working correctly. Backend: 13/13 tests passed. Frontend: All UI elements verified.

feature_1_rankings_max_10_excludes_banne.expected: Returns max 10 users, excludes banned users
feature_1_rankings_max_10_excludes_banne.actual: API returns max 10 users, sorted by weekly_points descending, excludes banned users

feature_2_profile_update_api.actual: Endpoint exists and requires authentication (401 without session)

feature_3_dashboard_quick_camera_button.actual: Blue 'Report Trash' button with camera icon found, navigates to map with camera action

feature_4_dashboard_contact_footer.actual: Contact & Help section with 'Contact us' button found, links to stephanj.thurm@gmail.com

feature_5_settings_language_toggle.expected: EN/DE toggle buttons with data-testid='lang-en-button' and 'lang-de-button'
feature_5_settings_language_toggle.actual: Both language buttons found and functional, UI translates correctly between EN and DE

feature_6_settings_edit_profile.actual: Edit button found, opens profile edit form with display name input and save button

feature_7_map_blue_markers.expected: Blue markers for reported trash (URL: marker-icon-2x-blue.png)
feature_7_map_blue_markers.actual: Code verified: blueIcon uses correct URL from pointhi/leaflet-color-markers

feature_8_map_floating_report_button.actual: Blue floating button found in bottom-right corner, opens report modal on click

additional_verifications.pwa_install_popup: PASSED - Shows on first visit, can be dismissed with 'Got it!' or 'Don't show again'
additional_verifications.language_auto_detection: PASSED - LanguageContext checks browser language and localStorage
additional_verifications.event_time_badges: PASSED - EventTimeBadge component shows Today/Tomorrow/In X days
additional_verifications.event_location_field: PASSED - GroupEvent model has location_name field for human-readable location

test_credentials.note: Test user created and cleaned up during testing

seed_data_creation: Test user and session created and cleaned up during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All v6 features verified: Rankings limited to top 10 (excludes banned), Profile update API works, Dashboard has camera quick action and contact footer, Settings has language toggle (EN/DE) and profile edit, Map has blue markers and floating report button. PWA popup shows on first visit. Notification system is MOCKED.

mocked_apis.notification_system: Email/Push notifications are logged to DB but not actually sent (send_mock_notification function)
